overview: Carole Ann Ford portrayed a unique character in Doctor Who. As Susan, The Doctor’s granddaughter, she left Gallifrey with the errant Time Lord before the very first episode, An Unearthly Child.  This Myth Makers combines two interviews by Nicholas Briggs, the first at Carole’s home in 1985 and the second at a London TV studio in 1996.  Together they give a very personal view of the early days of Doctor Who and the effects the programme had on Carole’s life and career.
title: Myth Makers 4: Carole Ann Ford
